-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Support for using HStringTemplate in Happstack
--   
--   Happstack is a web application framework. HStringTemplate is a
--   templating solution.
@package happstack-hstringtemplate
@version 7.0.4


-- | This module provides support for using HStringTemplate with Happstack.
--   <a>http://hackage.haskell.org/package/HStringTemplate</a>
module Happstack.Server.HStringTemplate

-- | <tt>webST name attrs</tt> renders a name template with attrs
webST :: MonadIO m => String -> [(String, String)] -> m Response
instance ToMessage (StringTemplate String)
